metadata.name: The Magic of Now
metadata.description:
We have the smartest phones in our hands, but still, we are pressed for time, we are always running. In this world, when everything can be taken care of with a gentle press of a button, one thing is still slipping through the gaps of our fingers... It is TIME. In today's world, the best gift that one can give another person, and for that matter to oneself, is their time. A quiet moment with someone, or oneself, that connects you with you. 

One sacred daily ritual for me is my morning coffee time. Those few minutes that I spend in my own company reset me and that is the moment when magical ideas blossom in my mind... 
Like colorful butterflies, they emerge from their cocoons and brighten up the darkest corners of my heart. 

The battle between the past and the future somehow settles down into a beautiful truce.  

The conflict between what, when, and how calms down into a state of tranquil peace.

 I know I have won my own battle, because I am in charge of my 'NOW'."

Medium: Digital Art  
Editions: 50  
Burn Date: 18 April 2022  
The unsold pieces will be burnt.

Utility: 
- Join CAW Pioneers Community  
- Own limited CAW Pioneer Series edition
